channel.title: Radio STEAM
channel.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
channel.itunes:summary: The Spectacular Tales of the Extraordinary Airship Mórríghan: The F.M.A.S. Mórríghan, crewed by Captain Decidia 'Dez' Black, Professor Perry Wilder, and their latest assembly of misfits and vagabonds
channel.description: The Spectacular Tales of the Extraordinary Airship Mórríghan: The F.M.A.S. Mórríghan, crewed by Captain Decidia 'Dez' Black, Professor Perry Wilder, and their latest assembly of misfits and vagabonds
channel.copyright: S.T.E.A.M. is written and produced by Victorian Productions, with all content the intellectual property of Victorian Productions and the individual authors thereof. All characters are Copyright Victorian Productions, LLC 2011

item.title: 1-01 The Beginning of the End
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Welcome! One and all! To the newly Premiered Radio Steam! We hope you enjoy your stay as we take you through this tale of Mystery! Intrigue! Suspense! and perhaps we'll make you laugh along the way. So sit back, relax and tune in to the very first episode of the one and only STEAM Radio!
item.description: Welcome! One and all! To the newly Premiered Radio Steam! We hope you enjoy your stay as we take you through this tale of Mystery! Intrigue! Suspense! and perhaps we'll make you laugh along the way. So sit back, relax and tune in to the very first episode of the one and only STEAM Radio!

item.title: 1-03 Mardi Gras Masquerade
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: New episode of Radio STEAM tonight! The crew is in New Orleans just in time for a Mardi Gras masquerade party.
item.description: New episode of Radio STEAM tonight! The crew is in New Orleans just in time for a Mardi Gras masquerade party.

item.title: 1-04 New York, New York
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Our heroes wander the streets of New York in search of answers.
item.description: Our heroes wander the streets of New York in search of answers.

item.title: 1-05 The Winds that Howl
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: London! An important destination for the whereabouts of Darwin's original manuscript. Familiar faces, warm fires, and old enemies.
item.description: London! An important destination for the whereabouts of Darwin's original manuscript. Familiar faces, warm fires, and old enemies.

item.title: 1-06 Heart of Darkness
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The crew is stranded an unknown island with little hope of escape. What will they find there?
item.description: The crew is stranded an unknown island with little hope of escape. What will they find there?

item.title: 1-07 Land of the Lost
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Our heroes explore the strange island on which they have been stranded.
item.description: Our heroes explore the strange island on which they have been stranded.

item.title: 1-08 Tasmanian Devil Pirates
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Our intrepid crew finds themselves in Tasmania, taking a slight detour from their intended journey. They are restless and find themselves wandering into strange situations.
item.description: Our intrepid crew finds themselves in Tasmania, taking a slight detour from their intended journey. They are restless and find themselves wandering into strange situations.

item.title: 1-09 Wild Outback
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: A daring and spontaneous rescue mission leads to another unexpected disaster in the outback. What will become of our daring crew?
item.description: A daring and spontaneous rescue mission leads to another unexpected disaster in the outback. What will become of our daring crew?

item.title: 1-10 Of Fruit and Birds
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The crew returns to civilization and searches the Bay of Islands for Darwin's Journal.
item.description: The crew returns to civilization and searches the Bay of Islands for Darwin's Journal.

item.title: 1-11 Foiled by Simplicity
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Return to London! A lead or just more problems?
item.description: Return to London! A lead or just more problems?

item.title: 1-12 Origin Theory
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Retracing Darwin's steps. Literally. Familiar faces and new enemies are abound.
item.description: Retracing Darwin's steps. Literally. Familiar faces and new enemies are abound.

item.title: 1-13 The Path Less Traveled
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Some sleuthing is required in the process of finding Darwin's journal. Close calls and tight scrapes are abound.
item.description: Some sleuthing is required in the process of finding Darwin's journal. Close calls and tight scrapes are abound.

item.title: 1-14 Second Island to the Left
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The crew of the Mórríghan finally reach the Galapagos Islands, but will they discover the secret behind the journal?
item.description: The crew of the Mórríghan finally reach the Galapagos Islands, but will they discover the secret behind the journal?

item.title: 1-15 Stand Off!
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Our heroes go from one three-way standoff to another, even bigger one. Will the crew of the Mórríghan escape unscathed?
item.description: Our heroes go from one three-way standoff to another, even bigger one. Will the crew of the Mórríghan escape unscathed?

item.title: 1-16 Showdown
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The season finale! With the end of their quest so near, a massive aerial battle ensues! Can our heroes defeat both the Persephone and the British Navy?
item.description: The season finale! With the end of their quest so near, a massive aerial battle ensues! Can our heroes defeat both the Persephone and the British Navy?

item.title: 1-17 Special - Making of STEAM
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Two week break, week one: Take a look behind the scenes at the making of Radio STEAM Season 1.
item.description: Two week break, week one: Take a look behind the scenes at the making of Radio STEAM Season 1.

item.title: 1-18 Special - STEAM Bloopers
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Two week break, week two: This week we offer up some voice acting bloopers for your amusement. Because hearing other people mess up is funny.
item.description: Two week break, week two: This week we offer up some voice acting bloopers for your amusement. Because hearing other people mess up is funny.

item.title: 2-01 The Heist Beckons
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The trip from the Galapagos to London is a long one. The crew whiles away their time reminiscing about how they fatefully met one another.
item.description: The trip from the Galapagos to London is a long one. The crew whiles away their time reminiscing about how they fatefully met one another.

item.title: 2-02 Skinning the Wolf
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: While in N'Orleans to deliver Darwin's manuscript to the hands of their mysterious client, the crew is reminded of their many enemies throughout the city.
item.description: While in N'Orleans to deliver Darwin's manuscript to the hands of their mysterious client, the crew is reminded of their many enemies throughout the city.

item.title: 2-03 Spitfire and Brimstone
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Even the trip back to their home base for repairs can't be easy for the Mórríghan crew, as they are accosted by enemies both familiar and unfamiliar.
item.description: Even the trip back to their home base for repairs can't be easy for the Mórríghan crew, as they are accosted by enemies both familiar and unfamiliar.

item.title: 2-04 Rock the Castle
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Castle Rock! The Mórríghan's Colorado base that happens to be near Tesla's base in Colorado Springs. The airship is in dire need of repairs and Tesla has all the supplies they need and more.
item.description: Castle Rock! The Mórríghan's Colorado base that happens to be near Tesla's base in Colorado Springs. The airship is in dire need of repairs and Tesla has all the supplies they need and more.

item.title: 2-05 Research Methods
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: It's time to figure out exactly where Noah's Arc is hidden. To the library!
item.description: It's time to figure out exactly where Noah's Arc is hidden. To the library!

item.title: 2-06 The Great Mórríghan Caper
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: A grand heist of epic proportions! Everything goes smoothly until the crew encounters a Royal mistake.
item.description: A grand heist of epic proportions! Everything goes smoothly until the crew encounters a Royal mistake.

item.title: 2-07 Of Cats and Clocktowers
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The crew takes a nice relaxing day off in London. But we all know that can't last very long. What kind of trouble will they get into?
item.description: The crew takes a nice relaxing day off in London. But we all know that can't last very long. What kind of trouble will they get into?

item.title: 2-08 Lament of the Falling Man
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: A day in the life of the navigator is never an easy one, but some days are better than others.
item.description: A day in the life of the navigator is never an easy one, but some days are better than others.

item.title: 2-09 Wings of Battle
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: En route to Constantinople... Istanbul, the crew encounters some trouble. They also have to barter like they've never bartered before.
item.description: En route to Constantinople... Istanbul, the crew encounters some trouble. They also have to barter like they've never bartered before.

item.title: 2-10 Vodka Soaked Villians
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The Navigator lost the Mórríghan, so it's up to the crew to scour the city streets to find it.
item.description: The Navigator lost the Mórríghan, so it's up to the crew to scour the city streets to find it.

item.title: 2-11 Spitting the Fires of Hell
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The crew of the Mórríghan is back on track for their quest when the Spitfire finds them again.
item.description: The crew of the Mórríghan is back on track for their quest when the Spitfire finds them again.

item.title: 2-12 The Village of No Return
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Having lost Captain Dez in the forest below, the crew sets out to find her. Will they succeed? Or are they completely incapable of functioning without their Captain?
item.description: Having lost Captain Dez in the forest below, the crew sets out to find her. Will they succeed? Or are they completely incapable of functioning without their Captain?

item.title: 2-13 The Rain on the Plain
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: While the crew cluelessly searches for the Captain, Captain Dez meets another god.
item.description: While the crew cluelessly searches for the Captain, Captain Dez meets another god.

item.title: 2-14 No Covenant for the Ark
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: After another crash landing, the crew unearths an artifact of Biblical proportions.
item.description: After another crash landing, the crew unearths an artifact of Biblical proportions.

item.title: 2-15 The Skies that Bind
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Our crew launches a mission to rescue Kit from the clutches of Captain Cassidy Jade, but what they find upon locating the Spitfire is completely unexpected.
item.description: Our crew launches a mission to rescue Kit from the clutches of Captain Cassidy Jade, but what they find upon locating the Spitfire is completely unexpected.

item.title: 2-16 Rivals of Another Breed
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: What awaits the crew behind that mysterious door in the belly of the Spitfire? Stay tuned for the exciting conclusion to Season 2!
item.description: What awaits the crew behind that mysterious door in the belly of the Spitfire? Stay tuned for the exciting conclusion to Season 2!

item.title: 2-17 Special 1 - Bloopers
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Two week break, week one: This week we offer up some voice acting bloopers for your amusement. Because hearing other people mess up is still funny.
item.description: Two week break, week one: This week we offer up some voice acting bloopers for your amusement. Because hearing other people mess up is still funny.

item.title: 2-18 Special 2 - Roundtable
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Two week break, week two: The cast of Radio STEAM sits down to talk about the project and how it got started.
item.description: Two week break, week two: The cast of Radio STEAM sits down to talk about the project and how it got started.

item.title: 3-01 What Have Ye Wrought?
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The Spectacular Tales of the Extraordinary Airship Mórríghan season 3 premier! What became of the unexpected meeting between Captain Dez and Beauregard? Find out now!
item.description: The Spectacular Tales of the Extraordinary Airship Mórríghan season 3 premier! What became of the unexpected meeting between Captain Dez and Beauregard? Find out now!

item.title: 3-02 The Cloned Wars
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Tales of the Mórríghan have made it to all reaches of the land and attracted both wanted and unwanted attention.
item.description: Tales of the Mórríghan have made it to all reaches of the land and attracted both wanted and unwanted attention.

item.title: 3-03 An Uninviting Excursion
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Some of the crew go to check in again with the Professor's old war buddy while the rest are invited to a friendly game of football.
item.description: Some of the crew go to check in again with the Professor's old war buddy while the rest are invited to a friendly game of football.

item.title: 3-04 Ze Plot Thickens
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: A murder! A heist! The crew buy private train tickets, but stumble across a murder and an old friend.
item.description: A murder! A heist! The crew buy private train tickets, but stumble across a murder and an old friend.

item.title: 3-05 The Christmas Disaster
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Our crew takes a little break to enjoy some pre-Christmas festivities in Berlin, but ends up making a mess of everything.
item.description: Our crew takes a little break to enjoy some pre-Christmas festivities in Berlin, but ends up making a mess of everything.

item.title: 3-06 Deserting the Cause
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Our crew returns to London to plan again but who could be lurking in the shadows?
item.description: Our crew returns to London to plan again but who could be lurking in the shadows?

item.title: 3-07 Riddle Me This
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Sick of the cold weather and the wind, our crew ventures to Egypt to seek further clues. A new villain confronts them, and the crew must answer the riddle of the Sphinx.
item.description: Sick of the cold weather and the wind, our crew ventures to Egypt to seek further clues. A new villain confronts them, and the crew must answer the riddle of the Sphinx.

item.title: 3-08 Mum's the Word
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The crew is in the belly of the sphinx facing undead enemies. In a moment of distraction, the Professor stumbles upon something shiny that may be of use...
item.description: The crew is in the belly of the sphinx facing undead enemies. In a moment of distraction, the Professor stumbles upon something shiny that may be of use...

item.title: 3-09 From the Eye of the Sphinx
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The villain returns. Sabotage! Now the Mórríghan is lost in Africa!
item.description: The villain returns. Sabotage! Now the Mórríghan is lost in Africa!

item.title: 3-10 Where Rome Has Gone
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Our crew visits the Serapeum at Alexandria, hoping to find scrolls saved from the now-destroyed Alexandria library.
item.description: Our crew visits the Serapeum at Alexandria, hoping to find scrolls saved from the now-destroyed Alexandria library.

item.title: 3-11 The Wasted Sands
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The lost library of Alexandria holds more questions than answers, and more undead enemies.
item.description: The lost library of Alexandria holds more questions than answers, and more undead enemies.

item.title: 3-12 On Strangers' Tides
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Moving on to the Tower of Babel the crew searches for more clues to the crystal's puzzle, what they find is much more startling.
item.description: Moving on to the Tower of Babel the crew searches for more clues to the crystal's puzzle, what they find is much more startling.

item.title: 3-13 When in Doubt, Apply Fire
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: After escaping from even more mummies, the Crew accidentally stumbles upon marks on the side of the Mórríghan. What do they mean?
item.description: After escaping from even more mummies, the Crew accidentally stumbles upon marks on the side of the Mórríghan. What do they mean?

item.title: 3-14 Through Stranger's Eyes
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: We offer an insight to the villain's minds while the crew is flying back to London.
item.description: We offer an insight to the villain's minds while the crew is flying back to London.

item.title: 3-15 Cube from Rube X
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The crew finally arrives in London and takes a well deserved break from the dry, dusty deserts.
item.description: The crew finally arrives in London and takes a well deserved break from the dry, dusty deserts.

item.title: 3-16 Battle of the Behemoths
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The Persephone shows up in the hands of Moriarty, and the epic battle begins. Can the crew of the Mórríghan defeat the infamous villain?
item.description: The Persephone shows up in the hands of Moriarty, and the epic battle begins. Can the crew of the Mórríghan defeat the infamous villain?

item.title: 3-17 STEAM Bloopers
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Three week break, week one: This week we offer up some voice acting bloopers for your amusement. Because hearing other people mess up is funny.
item.description: Three week break, week one: This week we offer up some voice acting bloopers for your amusement. Because hearing other people mess up is funny.

item.title: 3-18 The Future of STEAM
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Three week break, week two: A behind-the-scenes discussion of the future of The Spectacular Tales of the Extraordinary Airship Mórríghan.
item.description: Three week break, week two: A behind-the-scenes discussion of the future of The Spectacular Tales of the Extraordinary Airship Mórríghan.

item.title: 3-19 Interviews with the Crew
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Three week break, week three: An intrepid journalist sits down with the Mórríghan crew and asks them your questions.
item.description: Three week break, week three: An intrepid journalist sits down with the Mórríghan crew and asks them your questions.

item.title: 4-01 Pushin' Up Daisies
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The exciting conclusion of last season's episode. Moriarty is in a face off with the crew, what will happen?
item.description: The exciting conclusion of last season's episode. Moriarty is in a face off with the crew, what will happen?

item.title: 4-02 The First of Many Drinks
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The crew is back in their home base of Colorado, and are already stirring up trouble.
item.description: The crew is back in their home base of Colorado, and are already stirring up trouble.

item.title: 4-03 Dark Places and Dark Minds
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: A volcanic sinkhole opens up near Salt Lake City and claims Kit as its next victim. What will our intrepid crew do now?
item.description: A volcanic sinkhole opens up near Salt Lake City and claims Kit as its next victim. What will our intrepid crew do now?

item.title: 4-04 Into the Pit
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The search to discover the mystery of the haunted town continues, but our crew finds themselves over their heads in trouble at every turn. Will they escape?
item.description: The search to discover the mystery of the haunted town continues, but our crew finds themselves over their heads in trouble at every turn. Will they escape?

item.title: 4-05 Heart of Lava
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Our crew is now thoroughly trapped in a volcano. How will they escape?
item.description: Our crew is now thoroughly trapped in a volcano. How will they escape?

item.title: 4-06 Old Wives' Tales
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The crew find themselves at Fort Wingate, where an old prospector sends them on a hunt for gold that he discovered long ago but was never able to retrieve.
item.description: The crew find themselves at Fort Wingate, where an old prospector sends them on a hunt for gold that he discovered long ago but was never able to retrieve.

item.title: 4-07 The Sands of Crime
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Once again in the desert, the crew argues among themselves. Then something goes terribly wrong. Shangri-La??
item.description: Once again in the desert, the crew argues among themselves. Then something goes terribly wrong. Shangri-La??

item.title: 4-08 The Wind that Blows Sharply
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The adventure in Sangri-La continues, and gets stranger by the minute.
item.description: The adventure in Sangri-La continues, and gets stranger by the minute.

item.title: 4-09 The Tides of Strange
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The crew are back in their senses and in need of a new adventure. Will it be by land or sea?
item.description: The crew are back in their senses and in need of a new adventure. Will it be by land or sea?

item.title: 4-10 Airships Do Not Belong in the Sea
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: With the help of Captain Nemo, our crew begins their search for the lighthouse of Alexandria, hoping it will lead them to the ruins of Atlantis. What adventures await them under the sea?
item.description: With the help of Captain Nemo, our crew begins their search for the lighthouse of Alexandria, hoping it will lead them to the ruins of Atlantis. What adventures await them under the sea?

item.title: 4-11 Drowned in a Can of Sardines
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Two Captain Nemos! Real or not real?
item.description: Two Captain Nemos! Real or not real?

item.title: 4-12 The Ties that Bind
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The plot thickens! A meeting of the minds.
item.description: The plot thickens! A meeting of the minds.

item.title: 4-13 The New Ancient
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Dive! Dive! Dive! The Nautilus pushes the limits of oceanic exploration!
item.description: Dive! Dive! Dive! The Nautilus pushes the limits of oceanic exploration!

item.title: 4-14 If the World Were Divine
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The crew finds themselves in an underground cavern that may not exist underground. What treasures, or horrors, await?
item.description: The crew finds themselves in an underground cavern that may not exist underground. What treasures, or horrors, await?

item.title: 4-15 Out of the Darkness
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: Oh, just the usual devastating raging bubble shadow monsters. Yet another day in the life of a Mórríghan crewmember.
item.description: Oh, just the usual devastating raging bubble shadow monsters. Yet another day in the life of a Mórríghan crewmember.

item.title: 4-16 The Grandest of Finales
item.itunes:author: Victorian Productions
item.itunes:summary: The trap has been set, has the crew fallen in? Kit revealed! Will they defeat Madame Crimson, Moriarty, and escape with their lives? The thrilling conclusion of The Spectacular Tales of the Extraordinary Airship Mórríghan!
item.description: The trap has been set, has the crew fallen in? Kit revealed! Will they defeat Madame Crimson, Moriarty, and escape with their lives? The thrilling conclusion of The Spectacular Tales of the Extraordinary Airship Mórríghan!
